main.name: Farid Boulos
main.contactmessage: Please don't hesitate to contact me by phone or e-mail for any project or opportunity.
main.bio: I am an aspiring robotics engineer with a desire to improve the world around me! I am always looking for projects that can provide me with new learning experiences as well as have a positive impact on my community. Outside of work, I am an avid reader that loves to learn about new topics, especially relating to technology, history and space. Some of my hobbies include Calisthenics workouts, a friendly Paintball match or stargazing with a telescope.

resume.skillmessage: Please find below a list of my current skills:

education.degree: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description1: - Training in Front End and Back End development using technologies such as Next.js, ExpressJS, MongoDB and Strapi

work.title: Software Developer
work.description1: - Exploring the use of Augmented Reality and Robotics in future projects
work.description2: - Led the development of an Automated Donation Machine that prompts users to donate for a specific cause and thanks them for their contribution

work.title: Intern
work.description1: - Worked on Automated Acceptance Testing for a company product using Robot Framework and Selenium Library

work.title: Tutor
work.description1: - Tutored university students in Computer Science and Math. Course material taught includes but is not limited to Python, SQL, Microsoft Excel and SAT Math

work.title: Intern
work.description1: - Researched the possibility of moving one of the company’s products from Vue.js and ElementUI to the QuasarFramework as a proof of concept for future migrations

work.title: Intern
work.description1: - Created a “Heat Map View” application on Android Studio for an existing Android service that logs and sends the user’s location along with several network parameters to Invigo’s testbed server.
work.description2: - Translated the acquired data into an interactive map for clear display and accurate interpretation so that the data can be used to determine areas with low-quality networks and improve network quality therein.

skills.name: Programming Languages:
skills.content: Python, Machine Learning Libraries, JavaScript, C, C++

skills.name: Prototyping:
skills.content: 3D Printing, Laser Cutter, Machine Shop User

projects.title: Automated Greenhouse
projects.description: Built an Automated Greenhouse for Final Year Project with two teamates. Won the Exceptional Final Year Project award.

projects.title: Augmented Reality
projects.description: Leading the development of an Augmented Reality phone booth that will be used for advertising purposes.

projects.title: Reactive Donation Machine
projects.description: Designed and programmed a Windows PC to accept donations from users with a credit card machine. The machine thanks the user for their contribution with a video.

projects.title: 6-axis Robot Arm
projects.description: Research and Development on a 6-axis Robot arm. Tasked with improving arm movement.

projects.title: Old Projects (2015)
projects.description: Old Projects relating to an animatronic Iron Man Suit. These were done for hobby purposes.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.
